title: Isebenza kanjani - Ithempeli le-Orbital
heading: Indlela Esebenza Ngayo
intro: Iphrojekthi ye-Orbital Temple iqukethe izinto ezintathu ezixhumene ezisebenza ndawonye ukuthumela amagama ethempelini emkhathini.
paragraph1: Isathelayithi izungeza uMhlaba endaweni ephakeme ecishe ibe ngu-525 km, igcine amagama enkumbulweni yayo. Iziteshi ezingaphansi zixhumana nesathelayithi ngesikhathi sokudlula kwayo, zidlulisa amagama abantu abawahambisile ngesizindalwazi.
paragraph2: Uma uthumela igama, lijoyina ulayini futhi lizodluliselwa kusathelayithi phakathi nephasi elandelayo etholakalayo. Uzothola isiqinisekiso se-imeyili uma igama lakho selilayishwe ngempumelelo e-Orbital Temple.
